work.summary: My role is to provide fullstack interoperability solutions based upon requirements taken directly from end users.
Citizen developer for an internal risk management group.
highlights: Built an application that automated entry of Salesforce data, reducing a job that took several hours per month to seconds.
Maintained and enhanced several automated reports for the group.

work.summary: Citizen developer for the alternative investments group.
highlights: Built an application that was responsible for processing of and reporting on annual billing.
Maintained and enhanced an application responsible for processing all checks received by the group.
